typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ServicePointID as string,
		SPChannel as string,
		MeterBadge as string,
		RecordID as string,
		SPCUOM as string,
		SPCPowerflowdirection as string,
		SPCIntervalLength as string,
		SPCTimeZone as string,
		{Reading Date} as string,
		{Reading Hour} as string,
		ReadingValue as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(EXT_LOADDATETIME = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ServicePointID,
		SPChannel,
		MeterBadge,
		RecordID,
		SPCUOM,
		SPCPowerflowdirection,
		SPCIntervalLength,
		SPCTimeZone,
		Reading_Date = {Reading Date},
		Reading_Hour = {Reading Hour},
		ReadingValue,
		Status,
		EXT_LOADDATETIME
	)) ~> sink1
